summary: After committing a hit and run, a beautiful career woman attempts to clear her conscience by befriending her victim, a homeless but talented street musician.
cast: Michelle Harrison|Kirk Caouette|Angelo Renai|Paul McGillion|Marion Eisman|Sean Allan|Kelly Richard Fennig|Dana Pemberton|Dean 'Hook' Udy|Rob Rizk|John Mann|Jeff Weightman|France Perras|Gordon Grlica|Michael Kopsa|Sheldon Zaharko|Shannon Wilson|Trisha Yu|Glen Pinchin|Reg Tupper|Doug Cameron|John Cassini|Jennifer Copping
title: Hit 'n Strum
